item.title: My new client help plaease help
item.dc:creator: @Bunny_Ears Bunny Ears
item.description:
@Bunny_Ears wrote:

I believe you are asking about Port Forwarding.
– If not, sorry!

Anyways,

Steps:

Click Start --> Run --> Type CMD --> Type Ipconfig --> Press Enter

A long list of Ip’s should come up.

Next, look for the Ip that is called Default Gateway.

Open an Internet Browser, type that Ip in and it will take you to a website.

  • You might be asked for a password and username

Then go to Applications and Gaming.

Make the title whatever you want, for example ‘RsServer’

Set the ports ‘43594 to 43594’

Set it to TCP, and press Enable.

Scroll to the bottom and click ‘Save Settings’

I’m not sure if that was your problem, but you’ll have to encounter this sooner or later.

  ~ Bunny Ears
              - Good luck!

Read full topic
